alert.note: Alert for Southern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 08 at 9:07PM EST until November 09 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Total snow and sleet accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...The Mohawk and Schoharie Valleys, eastern Catskills, Herkimer County, northern Fulton County, southern Saratoga County, southern Washington County, northern Rensselaer County and southern Berkshire County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, especially on untreated surfaces. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will begin as a period of snow and sleet late this evening, then transition to freezing rain overnight. Freezing rain will then change to plain rain Thursday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
